text: Wilhelm Knabe (8 October 1923 – 30 January 2021) was a German ecologist and politician. He was a co-founder of the Green Party in Germany. Knabe was a Member of the Bundestag from 1987 until 1990. He was vice mayor of the city of Mülheim from 1994 to 1999. Knabe was born in Arnsdorf, Saxony. Knabe died on 30 January 2021, aged 97.Ein deutsch-deutsches Leben ist in Mülheim zu Ende gegangen ==Related pages== *List of ecologists from Europe ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German biologists Category:Ecologists Category:Politicians of Alliance '90/The Greens Category:Politicians from Saxony Category:Politicians from North Rhine- Westphalia Category:People from Mülheim
title: Wilhelm Knabe
